title: The Hazards of Sleeping with a Friend
description: Warning: Sleeping with a friend might change your life forever.Sleeping with Kyle was never in the plans. Pretending to be his girlfriend was one thing, but letting our relationship become anything but platonic was another. The problem with mixing friendship with sex is that inevitably feelings get involved, and when that happens there's no turning back.When Kyle's life fell apart around him, I needed to help, but doing that meant opening myself up to the most terrifying thing in the worldâ€”falling in love.
author: Alyssa Rose Ivy
